text: Roberto Teodoro Alemann (22 December 1922 â€“ 27 March 2020) was an Argentine lawyer, economist, politician, writer and academic. He served twice as Argentina's Minister of the Economy from 1961 to 1962 and from 1981 to 1982. He was born in Buenos Aires. On 27 March 2020, Alemann died in Buenos Aires at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine academics Category:Argentine journalists Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine economists Category:Argentine lawyers Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Scientists from Buenos Aires
title: Roberto Alemann
